commands.name: az webpubsub custom-domain create
commands.summary: Create a custom domain of WebPubSub Service.
examples: az webpubsub custom-domain create --webpubsub-name MyWebPubSub -g MyResourceGroup --name MyDomain --domain-name MyDomain.com --certificate-resource-id /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/MyResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Web/certificates/MyCertificate

commands.name: az webpubsub custom-domain delete
commands.summary: Delete a custom domain of WebPubSub Service.
examples: az webpubsub custom-domain delete --webpubsub-name MyWebPubSub -g MyResourceGroup --name MyDomain

commands.name: az webpubsub custom-domain list
commands.summary: List custom domains of WebPubSub Service.
examples: az webpubsub custom-domain list --webpubsub-name MyWebPubSub -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az webpubsub custom-domain show
commands.summary: Show the detail of a custom domain of WebPubSub Service.
examples: az webpubsub custom-domain show --webpubsub-name MyWebPubSub -g MyResourceGroup --name MyDomain
